div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: With spring sports cancelled this year, we would like to showcase our Class of 2020 athletes who will not get to participate this year. Go Tigers!! We Miss You! 🐾🖤🧡 view image

Any WHS student entering grades 9-12 wishing to audition for Ebony & Ivory, please add the Google Classroom with the code pictured. You will need to complete the audition assignment. #wltigertales view image

With spring sports cancelled this year, we would like to showcase our Class of 2020 athletes who will not get to participate this year. Each Senior athlete was sent an email from Mr. Sudvary. Please complete the Google sheet and send a picture to csudvary@wellsville.k12.oh.us in order to be included! Go Tigers!! We Miss You! 🐾🖤🧡 view image
